TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kolado't, title = Kolado't, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kolado't} }

S.FORM: Kolado't Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitung ko Kolado't a niyaro', 106 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 266 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 244 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 87%, Kebalan 1%, roma 4%.

Kolado't Itiniay i Changbin Cen no Taitong ko Kolado't a niyaro', 106 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 266 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 92% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 244 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 8% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 22 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 87%, Kebalan 1%, roma 4%.
